mapper.update: UPDATE tb_notification SET read_st = TRUE WHERE receiver_id = #{userId} AND read_st = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_notification WHERE receiver_id = #{userId} AND read_st = FALSE

SELECT content, notif_id, read_st, IF(date(send_dt) = current_date,true,false) as today, ( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, send_dt, current_timestamp) ) as ago FROM tb_notification WHERE receiver_id=#{userId} ORDER BY send_dt DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_notification (notif_id, sender_id, receiver_id, notif_tp, content) values (( select * from ( select IFNULL(max(notif_id)+1, 1) from tb_notification where receiver_id=#{receiverId} ) as sub for update ) ,#{senderId},#{receiverId},#{noteTp},#{content})
mapper.update: update tb_notification set read_st=true where notif_id=#{id}
